com.ifeng.plutus.core

类 PlutusCoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ifeng.plutus.core.PlutusCoreManager

  • public class PlutusCoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for qurey, loading, caching, etc.
    Vocabulory:
     adPositionId,  id of advertisement
     filterType, advertisement type to retrive
     startTime, start time for an advertisement
     endTime, end time for an advertisement
    作者:
    gao_miao

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static final PlutusCoreManager getInstance(java.lang.String urlSuffix)
        Retrive an instance of PlutusCoreManager
        返回:
        Instance of PlutusCoreManager

      • qureyAsync

        public <Result> void qureyAsync(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> selection,
                       PlutusCoreListener<Result> listener)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Qurey a specified object restricted by given selectionArgs asynchronously
        参数:
        selection - statement of qurey, can be one of:
         select=adPosition&adPositionId=3232&filterType=current
         select=thumb&key=http://s2.mimg.ifeng.com/upload/day_121126/201211261625269018.jpg
         select=config
         select=preLoad
         select=exposure&startTime=232332&endTime=343433443
        The contents to select:
         adPosition   For a specified advertisement data
         config   Configurations
         preLoad   ist of advertisements, load the datas
         exposure   Send data of exposure

        listener - The listener to notify
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if selectionArgs is null or empty

      • qureyAsync

        public <Result> void qureyAsync(PlutusCoreCallable<Result> callable,
                       PlutusCoreListener<Result> listener)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Submit a query with customized callable, the listener will be triggered after computing
        参数:
        callable -  The customized callable to submit
        listener -  The listener to notify
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • qurey

        public <Result> Result qurey(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> selection)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Qurey a specified object restricted by given selectionArgs synchronously
        参数:
        selection - Please refer to #qureyAsync(String, PlutusCoreListener)
        返回:
         The calculation result
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
